title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: lustrous). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A stunning two-layer haaram featuring an intricate floral design. Each floral motif is meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut diamonds. The necklace features round-shaped floral patterns, with eye-catching Emeralds placed along the neckline. The pendant showcases a traditional design with a central square-cut Emerald surrounded by diamonds. Delicate pearl drops enhance the elegance of the haaram. The setting is carefully crafted to maximize the brilliance of each diamond and gemstone.
colors: Cream (Pearls). A classic and elegant color palette.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Perfect for muhurtham
and any special occasion where a touch of regal elegance is desired.
description: A timeless piece of art, blending traditional South Indian craftsmanship with modern design. The combination of brilliant-cut diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and lustrous South Sea pearls makes it a show-stopper. This haaram is a valuable investment, combining cultural significance with exquisite craftsmanship.
